(r contra Ex eius tumba, de sancto Nicholao)

/ unus panis et unum corpus multi sumus Omnes qui de uno pane et de uno calice participamus /()

\ unus.1.01 panis.131'2101.10 et.32'45 unum.10'12'323.21 < corpus.156.5 multi.543.43'45 sumus.32'34'545.43; : Omnes.013=4.3 qui.345'35432'31 de.1013'231 uno.013=4.3 pane.3231.1 et.15 de.543 uno.45.45 calice.57=4'354'<56.5.5 participamus.15'64'35'78'75'#(#7643'545<$156435'7875'7643'545='43=21.21.01.12'323.21)\ \()

\. .101,2 .131210110,2 .3245 .101232321,2 .1565,2 .5434345,2 .323454543,2 .01343,2 .3453543231 .1013231 .01343,2 .32311,2 .15 .543 .4545,2 .5743545655,3 .1564357875# .()

\# #131'2101 #panis,1.7  #10'12'323 #unum,1.7  #32'34'545 #sumus,1.7  #345'35432'31 #qui,1.10  #1013'231 #de,1.7  #57=4'354'56 #calice,1.8  #15'64'35'78'75'7643'545$156435'7875'7643'545='43=21 #participamus,1.39 #()

\` 1d 1 01 31 21 01 032451 01 232321 565 43434532345454301 343453543231 01 3231 01 343231 543454574354565 1 5643578 7576435451 5643578 7576435454321 21 01 232321 `()

	(z @p RC OFM)

	\ et.32'345 \ multi.543=.43'45 \ quidem.34'545432.31 de.101'31 pane.323=1.1 \ participamus.15'6543=5'7876'#(#764'3545$1565435'787'57'64'354543=12'323.21)\ \(v ms 2: quidem for qui; underlay of -ticipamus quite unclear, and the tune ends as shown)

	\. .32345 .5434345,2 .3454543231,2 .10131 .32311,2 .1565435787# .(v)

	\# #34'545432 #quidem,1.8  #15'6543=5'7876'764'3545$1565435'787'57'64'354543=12'323 #participamus,1.44 #(v)

	\` 1d 323454343453454543231 01 31 3231 565 43578 7676435451 565 43578 757643545431 232321 `(v)

	(z @p :E 14)

	\ panis.1.131'210'10 \ multi.5.543.43'45 sumus.10'12'323'21; : Omnes.1.0 qui.13 de.3 uno.343.3 pane.323101.1 \ participamus.15'76'435'7875<#(#'643'545$15'76'435'7875'643'545=421.321.01.12)\ '323'21 \(v ms 3)
